transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Main bol raha hun Mukesh bol raha hun bataiye.
Executive: Sir aapke paas IndiaMART se call aayi hogi abhi ek dedh ghante pehle to aapne not satisfy mark kiya tha.
Customer: Haan bhai sahab mujhe main satisfy nahi main bhai sahab jise kehne chahiye na ki mera andar bhara pada hun main iske liye.
Customer: Matlab aapse bataun.
Executive: Mujhe bataiye sir kya issue hai?
Customer: Bataiye bhai sahab mere paise lag gaye 80000 kharch kar liye maine aaj tak mere ko ek paise ka benefit nahi mila ye hai banaas.
Executive: Nahi aapne unlisted service li hui thi na sir?
Customer: Maine bhai sahab do baar apne alag alag usme meri do company hai dono mein maine in sab package liya ek baar ek mein liya ek baar ek mein liya aur zero result hai.
Customer: Haan zero result hai bhai sahab.
Executive: Abhi tak koi business nahi mila aapko?
Customer: Zero ka matlab zero.
Customer: Bhai sahab zero ka matlab point thodi hota hai.
Executive: Main samajh gaya aapki baat.
Customer: Zero ka matlab aap samajh rahe hain na matlab zero ka matlab zero hota hai usme koi nahi hota na aage koi minus plus hota zero matlab zero hai.
Executive: Bilkul samajh gaya sir aapki baat main aapko isme element feed supplement mein deal karte hain na aap?
Customer: Haan element feed supplement mein deal karta hun bhai sahab. Bhai sahab saari to false query dalte jitni false query saari matlab saari false hoti hain.
Customer: Logon ka time kharab karte hain paisa kharab karte hain main kar raha hun main ja raha hun.
Customer: Paisa kharab karte hain unka time kharab karte hain dusron ka.
Executive: Maafi chahunga sir aapko ye problem face karni padi hai. But abhi aapne jo not satisfy mark kiya hai na wo account manager ke liye kiya hai Chandan Kumar ne aapke baat kari.
Customer: Nahi bhai sahab maine uske liye nahi kiya maine IndiaMART ke liye kiya.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo whatsapp pe usi ke liye feedback jata hai sir.
Customer: Jo bhi hai bhai sahab main to sabke liye negative mark karunga matlab jo mere sath hua hai bhai sahab wo bhavishya mein kisi ke sath na ho ye bhi koshish rahegi meri.
Customer: Jo meri thagai hui hai kisi ki aur ki na ho.
Executive: Sir dekhiye buylead to aapne use kari hai to ek bhi buylead se aapko kuch kaam hi nahi mil paya yahan se?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Aapne kaam to kafi use to kai kara hai aapne lekin business nahi mil paya yahi concern hai aapka?
Customer: Bhai sahab jab false query hai to business kahan se mil jayega ab ab meri baat nahi samajh rahe ye query false hoti hai to business kahan se milega.
Executive: Main samajh gaya har buylead thodi na false hoti hai.
Customer: Saari false hai bhai sahab total 100% false query.
Executive: Hain?
Executive: To abhi aap kya expect karte hain? Bhai sahab main ulte maine 15-20000 kharch kare hain kisi ko sample bheje bhi pura saari false hai main jaake dekha wahan pe kuch bhi nahi hai na jahan office ka address rakha wahan office bhi nahi banta false hai false address deke false query leke sample mangara hai wo bhi thagi kar rahe hain upar se company thagi kar li dusre sample leke mangara hai wo bhi false saari wo hai to kya jimmewar hai.
Customer: Koi verified buyer nahi hai.
Executive: Maafi chahunga sir aapko itni saari problem face karni padi hai. But abhi aap kya expect kar rahe ho sir?
Customer: IndiaMART se zero expectation hai bhai sahab.
Executive: IndiaMART se aapko business chahiye na sir?
Customer: Mujhe bhai sahab phir IndiaMART se mujhe dekhna bhi nahi hai usko ab main sach bol raha hun aap mujhe kahoge na kal ko 10 lakh ka business mil jayega mujhe nahi chahiye IndiaMART ka business.
Executive: To abhi mere paas concern aaya tha ki aapne jo account manager hai aapke Chandan Kumar uske liye not satisfy mark kara hai.
Customer: Bhai sahab Chandan Kumar ji mere ko 6 mahine se keh rahe ki bhai sahab main query bhejta hun wo wo aapki wo hongi ye hongi kuch nahi bhai sahab saari unhone bhi jitni bheji wo bhi saari false query thi.
Customer: Ek bhi verify share kari thi suno haan wo bhi saari false thi saari false hai bhai sahab.
Executive: Use kari thi aapne wo?
Customer: Haan maine unko phone kari maine baat kari unse party se saari false query hai.
Executive: Achha jo keh raha 20000 kamaiye wo wo keh raha mujhe ek ek wo chair bucket mein to waise hi dekh raha tha bhai sahab waise hi dekh raha tha to usne usne mere ko query bhej di uski ki 20000 query chair ko do chahiye 20000 ke de aage haath lagai maine usme un table pe lagai ek account mein aapke account mein to ek dedh mahine se sir koi buylead use nahi hui sir aur bhai sahab ab to ab to main ab to main use nahi kar raha koi bhi main to dekh hi nahi raha IndiaMART ka khol ke bhai sahab main aapko saaf bata raha hun aaj nahi dekh raha main dedh do mahine se dekh raha hun kar raha hai wo whatsapp pe share kar raha hai wo bhai sahab jo shuru mein jo shuru mein dekhi na maine wo bhi saari false thi bhai sahab false false hi hai phir main bekar mein time kharab karun baat ye hai na.
Executive: Bina baat kare aap kaise keh sakte hain? Mera bhai sahab mera to mera film hi phat gaya iske upar se bhai sahab saari baat ye hai jad ki mujhe koi ummid nahi hai isliye aapki jagah main bhi hota sir mera bhi man nahi karta.
Customer: Yaar wo nakki kar raha hai is baat pe dokhi nahi hai sudhar raha hun agar agar mujhe bhi business nahi milta to main bhi is cheez ko agree kar raha hun sir lekin agar koi banda baith ke aapko personally wo cheez share kar raha hai to phir aap use to kariye usko bhai sahab maine kari hai main bhi unme bhi kuch nahi tha faltu unme bhi jo usne whatsapp pe share kari hai aapko wo use nahi kari hai aapne sir maine kari hai bhai sahab maine unko phone kiye hain shuru mein lekin jab ye bhi false thi kaise kaise karwaya to phir bhai sahab false hi chal raha hai saara mamla jo bhi hai.
Executive: Main isme dekh leta hun sir aapke liye kya karwa sakta hun main dekh lo bhai sahab mujhe to koi ummid reh nahi bhai sahab maine tumse kehna hi chhod diya bilkul bhi shuru mein bahut kaam hai maine bahut phone kare jo bhi pehle account manager karaya tha Chandan se pehle bhi jo account manager bahut phone kare the lekin kuch nahi nikla result phir maine bhai sahab ummid chhod di bekar chalo koi thagi hogi sath mein koi baat nahi sir aisi baat nahi hai hum pura support karenge aapko aur main dekh leta hun usme aapke liye kya kar sakta hun.
Customer: Theek hai sab dekhiye sab.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting any business from IndiaMART.

- Claims all buyleads are false.

- Wasted money on false leads and samples.

- Expresses frustration with IndiaMART services.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the issues faced.

- Assured full support and offered to investigate.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will investigate the issue.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, false queries, business, account manager
